Articles.Content:
So, I was in the process of pruning out the unused parts from my Game Data folder and decided I didn't need the stock Mk3 space plane parts. I deleted everything with "Mk3" in the file name thinking I wouldn't miss anything. I checked my paths and was pretty sure all was good, but when the game loaded I immediately noticed that the "2.5m to Mk2" - "C7 brand Adapter 2.5m to 1.25m" and C7 brand Adapter Slanted 2.5m to 1.25m" stock parts are all missing their textures. None of the other parts were affected that I can tell. Apparently those three parts share a texture with the Mk3 parts. 

So, if someone could help me out and send the texture to my email along with the path info that would be super duper awesome squossum. (That's part squirrel part opossum) 

The path to the .cfg files is: /Game Data/Squad/Parts/FuelTank/adapterTanks 

TIA, 

-A.A.

Hi Aaron Also, where did you buy KSP? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I'm afraid no-one can send you the files but we can help you re-install them.

That was a direct purchase from Squad, I assume, cause I don't do the Steam thing. I never really thought about reinstalling kinda worried that would screw up the mods I have installed. 

Please do tell...

You can re-download the full game zip or the installer from your Squad store account [**\[here\]**](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/kspstore/), just login and click the "My Account" button to go to your account page ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Installing over the top of your existing game should work fine, as most addons go in their own folder which Squad files won't touch.
